remarks: Properties that determine a star ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2015.)
statement:
issrngd.k $e |- ( ph -> K = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
issrngd.p $e |- ( ph -> .+ = ( +g ` R ) ) $.
issrngd.t $e |- ( ph -> .x. = ( .r ` R ) ) $.
issrngd.c $e |- ( ph -> .* = ( *r ` R ) ) $.
issrngd.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
issrngd.cl $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. K ) -> ( .* ` x ) e. K ) $.
issrngd.dp $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. K /\ y e. K ) -> ( .* ` ( x .+ y ) ) = ( ( .* ` x ) .+ ( .* ` y ) ) ) $.
issrngd.dt $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. K /\ y e. K ) -> ( .* ` ( x .x. y ) ) = ( ( .* ` y ) .x. ( .* ` x ) ) ) $.
issrngd.id $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. K ) -> ( .* ` ( .* ` x ) ) = x ) $.
issrngd $p |- ( ph -> R e. *Ring ) $.
$d K x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d ph x y $.
